CustomField.description: Define the environment this event information applies to. Note, if you desire three different behaviors for the an event, i.e., pe_test__e, then you MUST define one for 'test', 'production' and 'debug'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Define the environment this event information applies to. Note, if you desire three different behaviors for the an event, i.e., pe_test__e, then you MUST define one for 'test', 'production' and 'debug'
CustomField.label: Environment
